name: Accelerated Mutation
text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
flavor: Its food just got a lot smaller and its stomach a lot bigger.
title: Accelerated Mutation

name: Ageless Sentinels
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
When Ageless Sentinels blocks, it becomes a Bird Giant, and it loses defender. (It's no longer a Wall. This effect lasts indefinitely.)
title: Ageless Sentinels

name: Alpha Status
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares a creature type with it.
flavor: The best leaders are made by their followers.
title: Alpha Status

name: Ambush Commander
text:
Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice an Elf: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
title: Ambush Commander

name: Ancient Ooze
text: Ancient Ooze's power and toughness are each equal to the total converted mana cost of other creatures you control.
flavor: The ooze has always been. The ooze will always be.
title: Ancient Ooze

name: Aphetto Runecaster
text: Whenever a permanent is turned face up, you may draw a card.
flavor: "The ignorant fear change; the wise use it as a weapon."
title: Aphetto Runecaster

name: Ark of Blight
text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Ark of Blight: Destroy target land.
flavor: When opened, it erases entire landscapes from minds and maps.
title: Ark of Blight

name: Astral Steel
text:
Target creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
title: Astral Steel

name: Aven Farseer
text:
Flying
Whenever a permanent is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Farseer.
flavor: His enemies' trickery and deceit only fuel his righteous anger.
title: Aven Farseer

name: Aven Liberator
text:
Flying
Morph {3}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Aven Liberator is turned face up, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
title: Aven Liberator

name: Bladewing the Risen
text:
Flying
When Bladewing the Risen enters the battlefield, you may return target Dragon permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
{B}{R}: Dragon creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
title: Bladewing the Risen

name: Bladewing's Thrall
text:
Bladewing's Thrall has flying as long as you control a Dragon.
When a Dragon enters the battlefield, you may return Bladewing's Thrall from your graveyard to the battlefield.
title: Bladewing's Thrall

name: Bonethorn Valesk
text: Whenever a permanent is turned face up, Bonethorn Valesk deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Barbarians weave its spurs into ceremonial charms to proclaim their hardiness in battle.
title: Bonethorn Valesk

name: Brain Freeze
text:
Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
title: Brain Freeze

name: Break Asunder
text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "No good will come of this."
title: Break Asunder

name: Cabal Conditioning
text: Any number of target players each discard a number of cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
flavor:
"Hear only the Cabal's voice.
See only the Cabal's way.
Speak only the Cabal's word."
Cabal mantra
title: Cabal Conditioning

name: Cabal Interrogator
text: {X}{B}, {T}: Target player reveals X cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
title: Cabal Interrogator

name: Call to the Grave
text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature.
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Call to the Grave.
title: Call to the Grave

name: Carbonize
text: Carbonize deals 3 damage to target creature or player. That creature can't be regenerated this turn. If the creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
title: Carbonize

name: Carrion Feeder
text:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.
flavor: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.
title: Carrion Feeder

name: Chartooth Cougar
text:
{R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
title: Chartooth Cougar

name: Chill Haunting
text:
As an additional cost to cast Chill Haunting, exile X creature cards from your graveyard.
Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
title: Chill Haunting

name: Claws of Wirewood
text:
Claws of Wirewood deals 3 damage to each creature with flying and each player.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: They say the forest has eyes. They never mention its claws.
title: Claws of Wirewood

name: Clutch of Undeath
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 as long as it's a Zombie. Otherwise, it gets -3/-3.
flavor: The hand of death recognizes its own.
title: Clutch of Undeath

name: Coast Watcher
text: Flying, protection from green
flavor: The aven came to fear the forest's clawing branches, but the watchers quickly renewed their courage.
title: Coast Watcher

name: Consumptive Goo
text: {2}{B}{B}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on Consumptive Goo.
flavor: Silent as fog and relentless as plague, it is wet, creeping death.
title: Consumptive Goo

name: Daru Spiritualist
text: Whenever a Cleric creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: He lifts the spirits of his people so they may descend in wrath upon their foes.
title: Daru Spiritualist

name: Daru Warchief
text:
Soldier spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Soldier creatures you control get +1/+2.
flavor: His victories speak for him.
title: Daru Warchief

name: Dawn Elemental
text:
Flying
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Dawn Elemental.
flavor: It was midnight on the Daru Plains, yet it seemed the sun was rising.
title: Dawn Elemental

name: Day of the Dragons
text:
When Day of the Dragons enters the battlefield, exile all creatures you control. Then put that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
When Day of the Dragons leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the exiled cards to the battlefield under your control.
title: Day of the Dragons

name: Death's-Head Buzzard
text:
Flying
When Death's-Head Buzzard dies, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Infested with vermin, ever hungering, dropping from night's sky.
title: Death's-Head Buzzard

name: Decree of Annihilation
text:
Exile all artifacts, creatures, and lands from the battlefield, all cards from all graveyards, and all cards from all hands.
Cycling {5}{R}{R} ({5}{R}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Annihilation, destroy all lands.
title: Decree of Annihilation

name: Decree of Justice
text:
Put X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, put X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
title: Decree of Justice

name: Decree of Pain
text:
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.
Cycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
title: Decree of Pain

name: Decree of Savagery
text:
Put four +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
Cycling {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Savagery, you may put four +1/+1 counters on target creature.
title: Decree of Savagery

name: Decree of Silence
text:
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, counter that spell and put a depletion counter on Decree of Silence. If there are three or more depletion counters on Decree of Silence, sacrifice it.
Cycling {4}{U}{U} ({4}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Silence, you may counter target spell.
title: Decree of Silence

name: Dimensional Breach
text: Exile all permanents. For as long as any of those cards remain exiled, at the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns one of the exiled cards he or she owns to the battlefield.
title: Dimensional Breach

name: Dispersal Shield
text: Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
flavor: "Maybe next time."
title: Dispersal Shield

name: Divergent Growth
text: Until end of turn, lands you control gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
flavor: Nature has forgotten its own rules.
title: Divergent Growth

name: Dragon Breath
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has haste.
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Breath from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.
title: Dragon Breath

name: Dragon Fangs
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.
When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Fangs from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.
title: Dragon Fangs

name: Dragon Mage
text:
Flying
Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.
flavor: "You'll bend to my willwith or without your precious sanity."
title: Dragon Mage

name: Dragon Scales
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has vigilance.
When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Scales from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.
title: Dragon Scales

name: Dragon Shadow
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Shadow from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.
title: Dragon Shadow

name: Dragon Tyrant
text:
Flying, trample
Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Dragon Tyrant unless you pay {R}{R}{R}{R}.
{R}: Dragon Tyrant gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
title: Dragon Tyrant

name: Dragon Wings
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Wings from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.
title: Dragon Wings

name: Dragonspeaker Shaman
text: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
flavor: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."
title: Dragonspeaker Shaman

name: Dragonstalker
text: Flying, protection from Dragons
flavor:
"When the skies are filled with flames, the brave shall step forward to quench them."
Order prophecy
title: Dragonstalker

name: Dragonstorm
text:
Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
title: Dragonstorm

name: Edgewalker
text: Cleric spells you cast cost {W}{B} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. (For example, if you cast a Cleric spell with mana cost {1}{W}, it costs {1} to cast.)
title: Edgewalker

name: Elvish Aberration
text:
{T}: Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool.
Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
title: Elvish Aberration

name: Enrage
text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "You wouldn't like me when I'm angry."
title: Enrage

name: Eternal Dragon
text:
Flying
{3}{W}{W}: Return Eternal Dragon from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
title: Eternal Dragon

name: Exiled Doomsayer
text: All morph costs cost {2} more. (This doesn't affect the cost to cast creature spells face down.)
flavor: He's desperate to hold back the future because he has seen it.
title: Exiled Doomsayer

name: Extra Arms
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor:
"Perhaps extra heads would have served them better."
Foothill guide
title: Extra Arms

name: Faces of the Past
text: Whenever a creature dies, tap all untapped creatures that share a creature type with it or untap all tapped creatures that share a creature type with it.
flavor: The ties that bind can also strangle.
title: Faces of the Past

name: Fatal Mutation
text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature is turned face up, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.
flavor:
"You wear that shell as a mask. Now it's your coffin."
Cabal cleric
title: Fatal Mutation

name: Fierce Empath
text: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
title: Fierce Empath

name: Final Punishment
text: Target player loses life equal to the damage already dealt to him or her this turn.
flavor: The pain of a lifetimeevery scrape, illness, and bruisecondensed into a single moment.
title: Final Punishment

name: Force Bubble
text:
If damage would be dealt to you, put that many depletion counters on Force Bubble instead.
When there are four or more depletion counters on Force Bubble, sacrifice it.
At the beginning of each end step, remove all depletion counters from Force Bubble.
title: Force Bubble

name: Forgotten Ancient
text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.
flavor: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.
title: Forgotten Ancient

name: Form of the Dragon
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dragon deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
At the beginning of each end step, your life total becomes 5.
Creatures without flying can't attack you.
title: Form of the Dragon

name: Frontline Strategist
text:
Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Frontline Strategist is turned face up, prevent all combat damage non-Soldier creatures would deal this turn.
title: Frontline Strategist

name: Frozen Solid
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.
title: Frozen Solid

name: Gilded Light
text:
You gain shroud until end of turn. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "Whoever survives the first blow lives to land the second."
title: Gilded Light

name: Goblin Brigand
text: Goblin Brigand attacks each turn if able.
flavor: After the Skirk Ridge collapsed, the goblins erected a system of ropes and pulleys to hold up what was left.
title: Goblin Brigand

name: Goblin Psychopath
text: Whenever Goblin Psychopath attacks or blocks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal combat damage this turn, it deals that damage to you instead.
flavor: The destruction he causes is nothing next to the chaos in his mind.
title: Goblin Psychopath

name: Goblin War Strike
text: Goblin War Strike deals damage equal to the number of Goblins you control to target player.
flavor: "Fire, aim, ready"
title: Goblin War Strike

name: Goblin Warchief
text:
Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Goblin creatures you control have haste.
flavor: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.
title: Goblin Warchief

name: Grip of Chaos
text: Whenever a spell or ability is put onto the stack, if it has a single target, reselect its target at random. (Select from among all legal targets.)
flavor: When the world is consumed by chaos, the skilled and the foolish are on equal footing.
title: Grip of Chaos

name: Guilty Conscience
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, Guilty Conscience deals that much damage to that creature.
flavor:
Those who most feel guilt don't need to, while those who most need to feel guilt never do.
Order proverb
title: Guilty Conscience

name: Hindering Touch
text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
title: Hindering Touch

name: Hunting Pack
text:
Put a 4/4 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
title: Hunting Pack

name: Karona's Zealot
text:
Morph {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Karona's Zealot is turned face up, all damage that would be dealt to it this turn is dealt to target creature instead.
title: Karona's Zealot

name: Karona, False God
text:
Haste
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps Karona, False God and gains control of it.
Whenever Karona attacks, creatures of the creature type of your choice get +3/+3 until end of turn.
title: Karona, False God

name: Krosan Drover
text: Creature spells you cast with converted mana cost 6 or greater cost {2} less to cast.
flavor: "Sit."
title: Krosan Drover

name: Krosan Warchief
text:
Beast spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{G}: Regenerate target Beast.
flavor: It turns prey into predator.
title: Krosan Warchief

name: Kurgadon
text: Whenever you cast a creature spell with converted mana cost 6 or greater, put three +1/+1 counters on Kurgadon.
flavor: When it walks through Krosa, trees step aside, leaves take wing, and the ground shudders.
title: Kurgadon

name: Lethal Vapors
text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, destroy it.
{0}: Destroy Lethal Vapors. You skip your next turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor: The vapors infiltrate every crevice, poison every lung, and snuff out every life.
title: Lethal Vapors

name: Lingering Death
text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, that player sacrifices that creature.
flavor:
"Looks bad. I don't know if he'll make it through the night."
Cabal cleric
title: Lingering Death

name: Long-Term Plans
text: Search your library for a card, shuffle your library, then put that card third from the top.
flavor: "Wait, it'll come to me in a minute."
title: Long-Term Plans

name: Mercurial Kite
text:
Flying
Whenever Mercurial Kite deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
title: Mercurial Kite

name: Metamorphose
text: Put target permanent an opponent controls on top of its owner's library. That opponent may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: If it's not one thing, it's another.
title: Metamorphose

name: Mind's Desire
text:
Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
title: Mind's Desire

name: Mischievous Quanar
text:
{3}{U}{U}: Turn Mischievous Quanar face down.
Morph {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Mischievous Quanar is turned face up, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for that copy.
title: Mischievous Quanar

name: Misguided Rage
text: Target player sacrifices a permanent.
flavor: Only when the anger passed did Varv realize he had burned down his home, destroyed his weapons, and killed his friend Furt.
title: Misguided Rage

name: Mistform Warchief
text:
Creature spells you cast that share a creature type with Mistform Warchief cost {1} less to cast.
{T}: Mistform Warchief becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
title: Mistform Warchief

name: Nefashu
text: Whenever Nefashu attacks, up to five target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Where the nefashu pass, blood rolls like a silk carpet.
title: Nefashu

name: Noble Templar
text:
Vigilance
Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
title: Noble Templar

name: One with Nature
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
title: One with Nature

name: Parallel Thoughts
text:
When Parallel Thoughts enters the battlefield, search your library for seven cards, exile them in a face-down pile, and shuffle that pile. Then shuffle your library.
If you would draw a card, you may instead put the top card of the pile you exiled into your hand.
title: Parallel Thoughts

name: Pemmin's Aura
text:
Enchant creature
{U}: Untap enchanted creature.
{U}: Enchanted creature gains flying until end of turn.
{U}: Enchanted creature gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
{1}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.
title: Pemmin's Aura

name: Primitive Etchings
text: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a creature card this way, draw a card.
flavor: Ancient carvings in the trees of Krosa glow with power once again.
title: Primitive Etchings

name: Proteus Machine
text:
Morph {0} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Proteus Machine is turned face up, it becomes the creature type of your choice. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
title: Proteus Machine

name: Putrid Raptor
text: MorphDiscard a Zombie card. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: It eagerly gobbles up bits of its own rotting flesh as they fall to the swampy ground.
title: Putrid Raptor

name: Pyrostatic Pillar
text: Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, Pyrostatic Pillar deals 2 damage to that player.
title: Pyrostatic Pillar

name: Rain of Blades
text: Rain of Blades deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
flavor: Some say they are the weapons of heroes fallen in battle, eager for one last chance at glory.
title: Rain of Blades

name: Raven Guild Initiate
text: MorphReturn a Bird you control to its owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: The Raven Guild soars on winds of unease.
title: Raven Guild Initiate

name: Raven Guild Master
text:
Whenever Raven Guild Master deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top ten cards of his or her library.
Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
title: Raven Guild Master

name: Reaping the Graves
text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
title: Reaping the Graves

name: Recuperate
text:
Choose one 
 You gain 6 life.
 Prevent the next 6 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor:
"Rise once more, so you may continue to destroy our enemies."
Karona, false god
title: Recuperate

name: Reward the Faithful
text: Any number of target players each gain life equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
flavor: "When you have drunk your fill, pass the cup to others who thirst."
title: Reward the Faithful

name: Riptide Survivor
text:
Morph {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Riptide Survivor is turned face up, discard two cards, then draw three cards.
title: Riptide Survivor

name: Rock Jockey
text:
You can't cast Rock Jockey if you've played a land this turn.
You can't play lands if you've cast Rock Jockey this turn.
flavor: Goblins don't know much about physics, but they know lots about falling and rocks.
title: Rock Jockey

name: Root Elemental
text:
Morph {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Root Elemental is turned face up, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
title: Root Elemental

name: Rush of Knowledge
text: Draw cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
flavor:
"Limitless power is glorious until you gain limitless understanding."
Ixidor, reality sculptor
title: Rush of Knowledge

name: Scattershot
text:
Scattershot deals 1 damage to target creature.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
title: Scattershot

name: Scornful Egotist
text: Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: "Once I was human. Now I am far more."
title: Scornful Egotist

name: Shoreline Ranger
text:
Flying
Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
title: Shoreline Ranger

name: Siege-Gang Commander
text:
When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
title: Siege-Gang Commander

name: Silver Knight
text: First strike, protection from red
flavor: Otaria's last defense against the wave of chaos threatening to engulf it.
title: Silver Knight

name: Skirk Volcanist
text:
MorphSacrifice two Mountains. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Skirk Volcanist is turned face up, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.
title: Skirk Volcanist

name: Skulltap
text:
As an additional cost to cast Skulltap, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor:
"Finally, a use for that head of yours."
Braids, dementia summoner
title: Skulltap

name: Sliver Overlord
text:
{3}: Search your library for a Sliver card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

"Hold that thought."
Pemmin, Riptide survivor

text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

"If I wanted your opinion, I'd have told you what it was."

name: Sulfuric Vortex
text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Sulfuric Vortex deals 2 damage to that player.

name: Upwelling
